DDescription.description: The domain and type of a ProcessStatisticsBO cannot be changed anymore.
The name of the process. Usually the name of the scheduled job or the replication process id. Used if and only if DoUpdateName is true. Required if DoUpdateName is true.
In case DoUpdateEndDate is true, EndDate is updated - possibly to null. In case DoUpdateEndDate is false, EndDate is not updated - even if present.
In case DoUpdateName is true, Name is updated - and if not present an exception is thrown. In case DoUpdateName is false, Name is not updated - even if present.
In case DoUpdateStartDate is true, StartDate is updated - and if not present an exception is thrown. In case DoUpdateStartDate is false, StartDate is not updated - even if present.
In case DoUpdateResult is true, Result is updated - possibly to null. In case DoUpdateResult is false, Result is not updated - even if present.
The start date of the process. Used if and only if DoUpdateStartDate is true. Required if DoUpdateStartDate is true.
The end date of the process. Used if and only if DoUpdateEndDate is true. If DoUpdateEndDate is true and EndDate is missing then ProcessStatistics:EndDate is set to null.

The result code of the process. Usually something like: "SUCCESS", "WARNING", "FAILURE", "ERROR", "NOTFOUND", "INTERRUPTED". See also process chain errors (<p:ignore>). Used if and only if DoUpdateResult is true. If DoUpdateResult is true and Result is missing then ProcessStatistics:Result is set to null.
The underlying process. Used if and only if DoUpdateProcess is true. If DoUpdateProcess is true and Process is missing then ProcessStatistics:Process is set to null.
In case DoUpdateProcess is true, Process is updated - possibly to null. In case DoUpdateProcess is false, Process is not updated - even if present.
